summary: This node is used for n8n training purposes and allows you to retrieve data about people from a dummy datastore.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform, either to get one person or get all people.

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit. This parameter is only applicable when the operation is set to 'Get All People'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return when the operation is set to 'Get All People' and 'Return All' is set to false. Must be between 1 and 10.
